scripts.build: npm exec spago build && nu build.nu
scripts.dev: nu build.nu watch & parcel serve index.html --watch-backend=watchman
scripts.release: rm -rf docs && nu build.nu && npm run build && parcel build --no-optimize --no-source-maps --dist-dir docs/ './index.html' './blog/*.html' && git checkout -- docs/CNAME docs/.nojekyll
scripts.publish: npm run release && git add . && git commit -m publish
